channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: A Librarian Hopes to Retire at 55 and Travel. Can She Afford It?
item.description: A financial adviser suggests she increase her contributions to a retirement account—by a lot.

item.title: Your parents’ Medicare decisions could come back to haunt you
item.description: Adult children may regret not paying attention to these healthcare choices.

item.title: Stocks Flat as Morgan Stanley Gains on Strong Earnings
item.description: Major U.S. stock markets were little changed as bank earnings add to evidence the economy is heading toward a soft landing.

item.title: ‘I’m convinced the U.S. will be drawn into World War III’: How do I prepare my finances?
item.description: “I believe this to be a legitimate concern. I would prefer a politically neutral answer.”

item.title: ‘Don’t be naïve’: I have a wake-up call for divorcing women — you’ve been giving up too much for too long. Am I wrong?
Dollar Strengthens As Inflation Cools In Developed Economies
item.description: The WSJ Dollar Index rose as the greenback gained against the pound and euro amid signs of cooling prices in the U.K and New Zealand.

item.title: Luxury's Last Growth Engine Has Stalled
item.description: A sudden slowdown in Chinese demand reported by Louis Vuitton’s owner is a bad sign for the luxury industry.

item.title: Tech stocks are nearing their first record high since July as dip-buyers get their wish
item.description: Information technology stocks have shaken off their summertime blues, even reclaiming the top spot on the stock market’s 2024 leaderboard.

item.title: Gold Futures Rise as Treasuries Fall Ahead of U.S. Economic Data
item.description: Gold futures rose, holding close to all-time highs and benefiting from falling U.S. Treasury yields ahead of key economic data.

item.title: What’s next for Tesla after Robotaxi day, according to Barclays
item.description: Tesla, fresh from showcasing its robotaxi, reports earnings next week and analysts at Barclays are calling for a better-than-expected financial snapsh...
